hateContent.text: Your life could be worse, you could be a black
I'm going to go to the middle of the town square, get naked, and paint myself brown
Why do you have so many drinks and you haven't touched any of them? Hello, Einstein, hooves, no freaking thumbs, can't pick up a glass

summary: The video contains various forms of hate speech, predominantly racial and ableist, with an overall hate speech intensity of 8%.
